scripts.imports:optimize: npx organize-imports-cli tsconfig.json && npm run lint:fix
scripts.prepack: npm run test && rm -rf dist && rm -f $npm_package_name-*.tgz && tsc
scripts.commit:version: git add package.json && git commit -m "updated package version to $npm_package_version" && git push
scripts.commit:hash: npm run update:hash && git add package.json && git commit -m "updated package.json git_hash" && git push
scripts.postversion: npm run commit:version && npm run commit:hash && npm run tag
scripts.release: npm run test && npm run patch
scripts.update:hash: cat package.json | sed 's/"git_hash": "\(.*\)"/"git_hash": "'"`git rev-parse HEAD`"'"/' > package.json
